messages.message:
@lydia is it ok to request this on Doc-insights project?
@Hari are you ok with this for DR?
yup that sounds fine to me. can you cc me on the email to IT?

Thank you all!
I sent the email

I'm taking a look now- so what you linked to is Jira Service Management (formerly Service Desk) and that's for asset management. I'm looking right now to see what options there are for doing this with Jira issues but what you linked to doesn't look like it's going to work

you’re right
maybe that’s more relevant
https://community.atlassian.com/t5/Jira-Software-questions/Inherit-JIRA-Fields-from-EPIC-to-story-task/qaq-p/1660908

Yep, it's looking like either using a plugin (which would have an associated cost) or using the built-in automation will be our best bet. I'll try to get a POC using the automation working in a test project.
